update-password.title: Update Password
update-password.description:
Update the password of your Zignaly Account.
For your security, you will be logged out after clicking Update password.
update-password.success: Password updated successfully. Please log in again.

enable-2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
enable-2fa.description: Secure your account setting up two-factor authentication (2FA). Right now, 2FA is considered the best security practice, read more <0>here.</0>
enable-2fa.setup-description: Download the <0>Google Authentication App</0> and scan the QR code, or paste the Key Phrase manually into the app. For security you will be logged out after introducing the 6 digit code.
enable-2fa.enter-code: Enter the 6-digit code from the app:
enable-2fa.enter-code-subtitle: You'll need it every time you log in.
enable-2fa.key-phrase-info: The Key Phrase is used to recover Google Authenticator in the event of a loss or change of device - please make sure to keep the key phrase safe before introducing the 6-digit code.
enable-2fa.success: 2 Factor Authentication enabled. Please log in again.

disable-2fa.title: Disable 2FA
disable-2fa.description: Your account is secured with Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). To disable 2FA, enter the code from your authenticator app.
disable-2fa.security: For security, we recommend to have 2FA enabled in your account.
